column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3:
暑苦しいゴロンの兄弟から
ガマンくらべの挑戦状を叩きつけられた

内容はいたってシンプル
3人よりも長く熱い土俵に乗り続けること 

ただ それだけだと言うが…
column4:
The Goron Blood Brothers have challenged
you to a test of will.

The rules are simple... The challenger who can
handle the intense heat within the ring for the
longest without leaving the ring is the winner.

They say that's all there is to it, but...

column3:
灼熱の試練に耐えたおかげで
古代の祠が姿を現した

……

…あ カベータのオトコの句の枠はないゴロ？
ちょっとざんねんゴロ…
column4:
After you endured the heated test,
a shrine suddenly appeared.

\"So sweaty... Brother...\"
-Kabetta

Oh, that's all from Kabetta?
That's too bad, brother...

column3: ガマンくらべ
column4: Test of Will

column3:
『オトコとは
厚き胸板
 フルハート』

装備をしっかり整えて
ハートも満タンで挑むのが筋ゴロ
バケット
column4:
\"A true Goron has a barrel for a chest and a
heart the size of his biceps.

Gearing up accordingly and having your hearts
filled up before competing is key, brother!\"
-Bayge

column3:
さらにキツい
ガマンくらべに挑戦することに

音をあげてしまった三兄弟の意志を継ぎ
しっかりと熱さ対策をしてから
灼熱の土俵に乗る必要がありそうだ
column4:
You've been challenged to an even hotter
test of will.

The three brothers admitted defeat before, but
this time you'll have to make sure you've got
some serious heat resistance if you want
to match their will in the scorching ring.

column3:
『オトコとは
気力体力
不屈の精神』

誰も到達したことのない領域ゴロ
熱さ対策もばっちりゴロね？！
ヒール
column4:
\"A true Goron needs mental fortitude,
physical fortitude, and spiritual fortitude.

This next test is beyond anything anyone
has ever attempted. You've worked out how
to protect against heat...right, brother?\"
-Heehl
